arozos.com

Cloud based Web Desktop Platform

Powering the next generation of remote workflows

What is this page?

This is a demo page for filling OEM information if you are making a devices with ArozOS pre-installed.

What is arozos.com?

arozos.com is the entity for building, testing and releasing ArozOS for different platforms and devices. If your lab is interested to release a customized version of ArozOS, please modify this page to fill your Lab's information.

System released by http://arozos.com
